record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3348
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3348 -- (Senate - July 28, 2008)

[Page: S7578]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 3348, introduced earlier today by Senator Coburn, is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the title of the bill for the first time.
The bill clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3348) to provide for the investigation of certain unsolved civil rights crimes, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bill will remain at the desk and have its second reading on the next legislative day.
